ðŸ“– Summary: Grid-Mobile is a cross-platform mobile application (iOS and Android) built with Flutter for private location sharing. It uses end-to-end encryption (E2EE) and integrates with the Matrix protocol for secure, decentralized communication, offering users control over who can access their location data.
